thread.title: Video: 1-on-1 interview with Miami Heat star Chris Bosh

title: Video: 1-on-1 interview with Miami Heat star Chris Bosh
text:
Video: 1-on-1 interview with Miami Heat star Chris Bosh Video: 1-on-1 interview with Miami Heat star Chris Bosh 
Chris Bosh tells Chris Perkins: "There was a 24-hour window where I didn't know if the [blood] clot was going to take my life." He also talks about his first job at Blockbuster.
